Definition.WordDefinition: Chunky, MS (town, FIPS 13580) Location: 32.32706 N, 88.92966 W Population (1990): 292 (134 housing units) Area: 2.2 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 39323

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Chunky \Chunk"y\ (ch[u^][ng]k*[y^]), a. Short and thick. [U. S.] --Kane. [1913 Webster]

chunky adj 1: like or containing small stick lumps; "the dumplings were chunky pieces of uncooked dough" [syn: {lumpy}] 2: short and thick; as e.g. having short legs and heavy musculature; "some people seem born to be square and chunky"; "a dumpy little dumpling of a woman"; "dachshunds are long lowset dogs with drooping ears"; "a little church with a squat tower"; "a squatty red smokestack"; "a stumpy ungainly figure" [syn: {dumpy}, {low-set}, {squat}, {squatty}, {stumpy}] [also: {chunkiest}, {chunkier}]
